title: annai vANiyin
sahitya:
annai vANiyin aDi paNindanan aimperum kalai aruLga enru nAn


anupallavi

  kannalin shuvaik-kalaiyin mEniyAL pannarum kavip-pAghu nenjinAL


caraNam    veNmaiyAm uDai veNmaiyAm aNi veNmaiyAm malar veN shuDar 
taNmaiyAm ishai tavazhum vINaiyAL tani mei jnAnamE taru nallanbinAL
